name: Love
description:
A reimagined VHS logo (circa 2014) is put through its paces, with love.

Process: A Sony KV-13FM12, Sony HVC-2400, Panasonic WJ-MX50A, Panasonic WJ-MX30, Videonics MX-1, Sony XV-C900, Yagi AV-EC3, 2x Futek FA403 and Victor JX-C7 dreaming of each other, through each other. Final output stabilized and enhanced via For.A FA-370.

Direct capture via Canopus ADVC-110, edited in Adobe Premiere Pro, played back through a Sony KV-13FM12 and rescanned via Nikon D7100 donning an Asahi SMC Takumar 1.8/55, interfaced direct to computer via HDMI to Blackmagic Design UltraStudio Recorder 3G and OBS Studio.

Footage edited in Adobe Premiere Pro, then composed, colour graded and rendered in Adobe After Effects and converted with HandBrake.
